game.name: IronBorn
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: What if you discovered that you have the power to stop an evil menace? What if you discovered that to complete that journey, you would have to face your own brother? Join Dale and his friends on a quest of self-discovery, friendship and heroism!
game.shortDescriptionEn: What if you discovered that you have the power to stop an evil menace? What if you discovered that to complete that journey, you would have to face your own brother? Join Dale and his friends on a quest of self-discovery, friendship and heroism!

reviewHighlights.text: [h2]IronBorn[/h2] Has a total of [b]5[/b] trading cards.
